title: Cleansed
description: This stunning play from the controversial author of Blasted premi√®red at the Royal Court Theatre, London in spring 1998A provocative play from the notorious author of Blasted, which probes the nightmarish world of twenty-somethings coming to grips with sexuality, social ostracism and the effects of drugs. Kane's first play Blasted caused major controversy, furore and acclaim amongst critics and throughout the theatre world
author: Sarah Kane
